file-upload: Upload a custom spectrum in either ASCII.ECSV or FITS file formats with column names WAVELENGTH and FLUX, including properly specified units in the header
exposure: Individual exposure time, select range of values with min and max
target: Specify whether you wish to calculate exposure time or SNR
water-vapor-unit: Specify precipitable water vapor, negligile in wavelengths < 1.3 um
dithers: Specify number of dithers, default to 1 (no dither)
coadds: Specify number of coadds, default to 1
reads: Specify detector number of CDS reads
slit: Specify slit, in WIDTH x LENGTH format
